name: Sunset Over Lievnos: Turn-based strategy game for PC & iPad
blurb: Sunset Over Lievnos is a turn based grand strategy game for PC & iPad inspired by old-school classics like KOEI's Gemfire.

rewards.reward: As a Thank You we will include your name in the credits of the game.
A copy of the game PLUS a promotional wallpaper download you can use on your desktop and phone.
A set of nifty pin-back buttons!  PLUS a copy of the game and the promotional desktop background.
A copy of the game PLUS a sticker pack with artwork from the game to decorate any surface, a promotional wallpaper download you can use on your desktop and phone, and the pin-back buttons.
A copy of the game PLUS a download of the original Sunset Over Lievnos Soundtrack,  the sticker pack, the pin buttons, and the promotional desktop wallpaper.

We will name a selected character after you!  or you choose that characters name !   ( We reserve final approval ) & a signed 11x 14 custom print from one of our Lievnos royal families. Featuring Erika\u2019s illustrated portraits.\r\n\r\nPLUS a copy of the game, a download of the original Sunset Over Lievnos Soundtrack,  the sticker pack, the pin buttons, and the promotional desktop wallpaper.

A signed 11x 14 custom print from one of our Lievnos royal families. Featuring Erika\u2019s illustrated portraits. \r\n\r\n PLUS a copy of the game, a download of the original Sunset Over Lievnos Soundtrack, the sticker pack, the pin buttons, and the promotional desktop wallpaper.

You get to name a selected Character AND you get the ORIGINAL ARTWORK of that character! We will name the character after you, or you choose the characters name.  (We reserve final approval).   *Plus, a selection of promotional materials from the previous reward levels!

A Limited Edition, graphic novel style, copy of the comic used in the game as our intro! \r\nAnd ALL of our signed, custom Lievnos royal family prints and promotional materials from previous reward levels.   PLUS a copy of the game, a download of the original Sunset Over Lievnos Soundtrack, the sticker pack, the pin buttons, and the promotional desktop wallpaper.

Your likeness, or a family member (great as a gift!) illustrated by Erika and used as a character portrait in the game! This is a special opportunity because you will also get the ORIGINAL ARTWORK!
